text: A decorative fountain adorns the square in front of the manor. Once, a sorrowful little angel poured water into its basin, but now the edge is overgrown with weeds, and the angel's jug is cracked. Old flowerbeds line the path with sharp-edged underbrush that seems to wind around your ankles with every step. You can also see a narrow path which leads to the side of the house.

actions.text: Go to the side of the house.
